constructor.details: Initializes the Semaphore verifiers used to verify the user's ZK proofs.

params._verifiers: : List of Semaphore verifiers (address and related Merkle tree depth).

verifiers.details: Gets a tree depth and returns its verifier address.

NullifierHashAdded(uint256).notice: Emitted when a proof is verified correctly and a new nullifier hash is added.
